intro: Kohleria moritziana, commonly known as the flame violet, is a flowering plant native to Brazil. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that range in color from red to orange. The plant features succulent, fleshy leaves that help it retain moisture in its natural habitat. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often cultivated as a houseplant due to its ornamental value. Kohleria moritziana is also valued for its ability to bloom throughout the year under proper care.
